events.description: The ECB left borrowing costs unchanged.
The Bank of England left borrowing costs unchanged.

facts.fact_text: Frankfurt's DAX 40 fell more than 1% to below 24,400.

evidences.evidence_text: Frankfurt's DAX 40 extended losses on Thursday afternoon, falling more than 1% to below 24,400
Rheinmetall slumped as much as 8%, heading for its biggest one-day drop in over ten months
SAP and Infineon Technologies saw more modest rises of 1.7% and 1.6%, respectively.
SAP and Infineon Technologies saw more modest rises of 1.7% and 1.6%, respectively.

claims.claim_text: Aggressive AI spending may undermine profitability.

evidences.evidence_text: a global tech rout resumed amid renewed fears that aggressive AI spending may undermine profitability.

claims.claim_text: Inflation could fluctuate in the months ahead amid greater uncertainty.
claims.author: President Lagarde

evidences.evidence_text: President Lagarde said the central bank and eurozone inflation outlook remain in a “good place,” but cautioned that inflation could fluctuate in the months ahead amid greater uncertainty.

claims.claim_text: Weak preliminary forecasts for 2026 caused Rheinmetall to slump.

evidences.evidence_text: Rheinmetall slumped as much as 8%, heading for its biggest one-day drop in over ten months, with brokers also citing weak preliminary forecasts for 2026.

claims.claim_text: Easing geopolitical tensions caused Hensoldt and Renk to fall.

evidences.evidence_text: Hensoldt (-1%) and Renk (-0.2%) also fell amid signs of easing geopolitical tensions.

evidence.evidence_text: Traders also digested the latest ECB and Bank of England decisions, which left borrowing costs unchanged.
Traders also digested the latest ECB and Bank of England decisions, which left borrowing costs unchanged.
a global tech rout resumed amid renewed fears that aggressive AI spending may undermine profitability.
President Lagarde said the central bank and eurozone inflation outlook remain in a “good place,” but cautioned that inflation could fluctuate in the months ahead amid greater uncertainty.
Hensoldt (-1%) and Renk (-0.2%) also fell amid signs of easing geopolitical tensions.
